title: BulkColumnUpdatePreview
description: Preview response for bulk column update showing what will change for each column.

totalColumns.description: Total number of columns that will be updated.

columnPreviews.description: List of column update previews showing current vs new values.

columnUpdatePreview.description: Preview of changes for a single column showing diff between current and new values.

columnFQN.description: Fully qualified name of the column.

entityType.description: Type of entity containing the column (table, dashboardDataModel, etc.).

entityFQN.description: Fully qualified name of the parent entity.

entityDisplayName.description: Display name of the parent entity.

newValues.description: New column metadata values that will be applied.

hasChanges.description: True if there are actual changes between current and new values.

columnMetadata.description: Column metadata including display name, description, tags, and glossary terms.

tags.description: Tags and glossary terms associated with the column.
